tokens.text: can be given items by players

generated_doNotEdit.title: Giveable
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines sets of items that can be used to trigger events when used on this entity. The item will also be taken and placed in the entity's inventory.

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: An optional cool down in seconds to prevent spamming interactions.

fields.title: Items
fields.description: The list of items that can be given to the entity to place in their inventory.

fields.title: Give
fields.description: Event to fire when the correct item is given.
